price: Ìbùkún ni fún orúkọ Olúwa rẹ, Atóbi, Alápọ̀n-ọ́nlé.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
